title: getting over constantly getting lpq because of this garbage client.
body:
im getting fucking sick of getting leaverbusters because of this fickle fucking client....

i was just getting into game when the client crashes my pc , i start it back up and it wont let me log in because my password is wrong despite being able to log in to the forums so i now lose lp, the time i spent queing up and im now going to get a leaver buster because its a ranked game..... this happens frequently on a monthly basis and im getting over it.

for such a massive game... this is the shittest fucking game client i have ever encountered and penalizes you for its faults, its fucking bullshit.
